scenes.text: Are you a gymnast, dancer, cheerleader, or just someone looking to keep fit and try something new? The Cardiff Snakecharmers Cheerleading & Dance Team welcomes everyone, whether you have experience or are just starting out!

Our teams train regularly throughout the week, with specific schedules for each team. Training sessions are designed to build skill, strength, and team spirit. We post all up-to-date information about taster sessions and tryouts on our Facebook page 'Cardiff Snakecharmers Cheer and Dance' and our Instagram 'cardiffuniversitycheer'. Follow us to stay informed about all our training times and updates.

Membership costs vary depending on the team you join and the level of competition. 

General Membership: £75
Dance only Membership: £50
Social Membership: £25
Coaches Membership: £35

Please note that once paid, no refunds are available, so make sure to attend our taster sessions to see if we are the right fit for you before committing.

Being a Snakecharmer isn’t just about training and competing; we also have a vibrant social scene. We host various social events throughout the year, including themed nights out, team bonding activities, and collaborative events with other sports clubs. These socials are a fantastic way to get to know your teammates better and make lifelong friends.
